resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1256</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Shalosh Regalim with Rabbi Hillel: A WebQuest that Compares the Shalosh Regalim in History</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Shalosh Regalim mit Rabbiner Hillel: 
Ein WebQuest, das das Shalosh Regalim in der Geschichte 
vergleicht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Shalosh Regalim avec Rabbin Hillel : Un 
WebQuest qui compare le Shalosh Regalim dans l'histoire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Shalosh Regalim com rabbi Hillel: Um 
WebQuest que compare o Shalosh Regalim no history</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Shalosh Regalim con il rabbi Hillel: Un 
WebQuest che confronta lo Shalosh Regalim nella storia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Shalosh Regalim με το ραβίνο Hillel: Ένα
WebQuest που συγκρίνει το Shalosh Regalim στην ιστορία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Shalosh Regalim con el Rabino Hillel: Un
WebQuest que compara el Shalosh Regalim en historia</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Five and sixth graders will explore the Shalosh Regalim as they were observed in the Second Temple era. In the webquest, learners go back in time and meet Rabbi Hillel and learn about the agricultural, historical and religious aspects of each holiday.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Shalosh Regalim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Second Temple era</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Rabbi Hillel</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fünf und 6. Sortierer erforschen das Shalosh 
Regalim, wie sie in der zweiten Bügelära beobachtet wurden. Im
webquest gehen Anfänger zurück in Zeit und treffen Rabbiner 
Hillel und erlernen über die landwirtschaftlichen, historischen und 
frommen Aspekte jedes Feiertags.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les cinq et sixièmes niveleuses exploreront le 
Shalosh Regalim comme on les a observé dans la deuxième ère de 
temple. Dans le webquest, les étudiants retournent à temps et 
rencontrent Rabbin Hillel et se renseignent sur les aspects 
agricoles, historiques et religieux de chaque vacances.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cinco e sextos graduadores explorarão o Shalosh 
Regalim como foram observados na segunda era do temple. No mais 
webquest, os learners vão para trás a tempo e encontram-se com o 
rabbi Hillel e aprendem-se sobre os aspectos agriculturais, 
históricos e religiosos de cada feriado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cinque e sesti selezionatori esploreranno lo 
Shalosh Regalim sono stati osservati nella seconda era del tempiale. 
Nel più webquest, i principianti vanno indietro a tempo e 
vengono a contatto del rabbi Hillel ed imparano circa le funzioni 
agricole, storiche e religiose di ogni festa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πέντε και έκτα γκρέιντερ θα εξερευνήσουν το Shalosh
Regalim όπως παρατηρήθηκαν στη δεύτερη εποχή ναών. Στον 
pjo' ωεψquεστ, οι αρχάριοι επιστρέφουν εγκαίρως και συναντούν 
το ραβίνο Hillel και μαθαίνουν για τις γεωργικές, ιστορικές και
θρησκευτικές πτυχές κάθε διακοπών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cinco y sextos graduadores explorarán el Shalosh 
Regalim como los observaron en la segunda era del templo. En el 
ma's webquest, los principiantes entran detrás en tiempo y satisfacen
a Rabino Hillel y aprenden sobre los aspectos agrícolas, 
históricos y religiosos de cada día de fiesta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Shalosh Regalim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zweite Bügelära</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rabbiner Hillel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Shalosh Regalim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deuxième ère de temple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rabbin Hillel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Shalosh Regalim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Segunda era do temple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rabbi Hillel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Shalosh Regalim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Seconda era del tempiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rabbi Hillel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Shalosh Regalim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη εποχή ναών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραβίνος Hillel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Shalosh Regalim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Segunda era del templo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rabino Hillel</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
